widgets.title: Duration percentiles
widgets.nrql: select percentile(duration, 50, 95, 99) from Transaction where ts_client_account_id is not null timeseries
widgets.notes: Percentiles for transactions that used the Cassandra client

widgets.title: Query volume by bucket size
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) from Transaction where ts_client_account_id is not null facet ts_client_period_millis timeseries
widgets.notes: Number of queries by time bucket

widgets.title: Query volume by time window
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) as `Query count` from Transaction facet ts_client_time_window_size_millis timeseries

widgets.title: Query volume by account
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) from Transaction facet ts_client_account_id timeseries

widgets.title: Query duration by bucket size
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) from Transaction facet ts_client_period_millis timeseries

widgets.title: Query duration by time window
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) from Transaction facet ts_client_time_window_size_millis timeseries

widgets.title: Query duration by account
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) from Transaction facet ts_client_account_id timeseries

widgets.title: Metric, Real Agent and Date counts
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(ts_client_metric_count) as `Metrics queried`, average(ts_client_real_agents_count) as `Real agents queried`, average(ts_client_query_count / ts_client_metric_count / ts_client_real_agents_count) as `Date buckets queried` from Transaction timeseries
widgets.notes: Average number of metric IDs, real agent IDs and date buckets each query had to scan

widgets.title: Individual SELECT statements
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(ts_client_query_count) as `Query count` from Transaction facet ts_client_period_millis timeseries
widgets.notes: Average number of Cassandra SELECT statements issued by bucket size
